name: Quick and Easy Shrimp Fajitas
author: AnneMo
summary: This is a twist on a classic recipe using shrimp instead of beef or chicken. I use regular old taco seasoning to make it easier, but any seasoning combination for fajitas will work. Serve with refried beans and Spanish rice to make an easy meal!
ingredients: 1 pound medium shrimp - peeled and deveined
directions: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add the red and green bell peppers, and onion
Cook, stirring frequently until peppers are hot, but still slightly crisp, about 5 minutes
Remove from the skillet and set aside
Pour the remaining 1/2 tablespoon of oil into the skillet, and add the shrimp
Cook, stirring occasionally, until pink and opaque
Reduce heat to low, and return the peppers and onion to the skillet
Stir in   and water so  that everything is evenly coated
